articles.title: New Space Marine Codex Announced
articles.excerpt: Games Workshop has officially announced the upcoming release of the new Space Marine Codex, featuring updated rules and new units for the 10th edition.

articles.title: Kill Team: Season 3 Preview
articles.excerpt: Get ready for the next season of Kill Team with new terrain, missions, and faction updates. Season 3 promises to bring even more tactical depth to the skirmish game.

articles.title: Warhammer 40k Tournament Results
articles.excerpt: The latest major tournament results are in! See which armies dominated the competitive scene and what strategies are proving most effective in the current meta.

articles.title: Painting Masterclass: Weathering Techniques
articles.excerpt: Learn advanced weathering techniques for your miniatures, including chipping, rust effects, and battle damage that will make your models look truly battle-worn.

articles.title: Age of Sigmar: New Faction Teased
articles.excerpt: A mysterious new faction has been teased for Warhammer Age of Sigmar. Speculation is running wild about what this could mean for the Mortal Realms.

articles.title: Community Spotlight: Amazing Conversions
articles.excerpt: This week's community spotlight features incredible kitbashing and conversion work from talented hobbyists around the world. Get inspired for your next project!
